show-case.title: PenPals App
show-case.description: PenPals is Mobile application, it was built by React Native. PenPals has idea as Interpal or Facebook that we can chat with friend, post activites, notification and friend social. but the difference of PenPals is the tags, Tags are a personal preference identicator in order to made relationship each other.

6.title: R&D Micro Frontend

3.title: Tank
3.description: Tank is a game that contain mechanic same as reality tank. Tank is a single player game and fighting with bot. you can rotate turret for shooting weak spot of tank such as behind or side but front side has huge armor that you mightn't be able penetrate.
